section.title: (PROFILE CUSTOMIZATION) - additions to exclude-dirs
section.para: This module allows the profile to contain specific executables that should be added to /var/lib/oslockdown/files/exclude_dirs file processing when this profile is run. The additions are transient, and will not persist past the execution of the profile.

listitem.para:
Additional directories to exclude (one per line)
This allows for Profile specific directories that OS Lockdown will exclude from processing. There should be one directory per line.
